          <title>
            <string language="en">Simulated chip pan fire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Simuliertes Chip-Wanne Feuer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le feu simulé de casserole de puce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fogo simulado da bandeja da microplaqueta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fuoco simulato della vaschetta porta-trucioli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μιμούμενη παν πυρκαγιά τσιπ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuego simulado de la cacerola de la viruta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of a series of four illustrations showing the heating of some wax in a tobacco tin.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fire</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">fuel</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von einer Reihe von vier Abbildungen, 
welche die Heizung irgendeines Wachses in einem Tabakzinn zeigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord d'une série de quatre illustrations 
montrant le chauffage d'une certaine cire dans un bidon de tabac.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de uma série de quatro 
ilustrações que mostram o heating de alguma cera em uma lata do 
tabaco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di una serie di quattro 
illustrazioni che mostrano il heating di una certa cera in una latta 
del tabacco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα μιας σειράς τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν τη θέρμανση κάποιου κεριού σε έναν κασσίτερο καπνών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de una serie de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran la calefacción de un poco de cera en una lata del tabaco.</string>
          </description>
